item.title: HTB - Sunday
item.description: nmap Quick scan nmap -p- -T4 --min-rate=5000 10.10.10.76 PORT STATE SERVICE 79/tcp open finger 111/tcp open rpcbind 22022/tcp open unknown 41931/tcp open unknown 64172/tcp open unknown Most notable is finger >nmap -p79,111,22022,41931,64172 -sC -sV -oA nmap/sunday 10.10.10.76 Starting Nmap 7.80 ( https://nmap.org ) at 2020-09-19 18:17 HKT Nmap scan report for 10.10.10.76 Host is up (0.050s latency). PORT STATE SERVICE VERSION 79/tcp open finger Sun Solaris fingerd |_finger: No one logged on\x0D 111/tcp open rpcbind 2-4 (RPC #100000) 22022/tcp open ssh SunSSH 1.
